peopleAlsoAsk.question: What was Gloria Vanderbilt's highest net worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: She is buried next to her son Carter and late husband Wyatt in the Cooper plot in the Vanderbilt Family Cemetery on Staten Island, New York. While she was rumored to be worth $200 million, upon her death Vanderbilt left son Anderson her estate, which was worth approximately $1.5 million.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Where did all of Gloria Vanderbilt's money go?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Gloria Vanderbilt, the railroad fortune heiress, left most of the Vanderbilt fortune to her youngest son, Anderson Cooper. On a personal note, I just love Cooper's giggle, and feel for that reason alone she made the right choice!

peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Cornelius Vanderbilt II He inherited $5 million upon The Commodore's death. He inherited $70 million upon his father's death. He was appointed manager of the New York Central Railroad in 1892. He was a financially active supporter of the YMCA, Red Cross, Salvation Army, and several churches.
